title: My favorite online store
text: Temu is as you can see by the money I constantly spend is my favorite site to buy clothing for my daughter at an affordable price the wait time isn‚Äôt too too long it is long but not months long I love the quality of the fabrics the options in sizes colors designs and for a mom on fixed income with a 5 year old daughter who is growing I am not spending a fortune on retail stores clothing because Temu offers soo many options and styles for my little diva and for myself as a pregnant woman whose weight is changing with the pregnancy I again am not spending a fortune as for the household items and games puzzles men‚Äôs things jewelry it‚Äôs amazingly overwhelming and soooo many things to choose from

title: Angry
text: I was nice enough to give it a three stars just for the fact the first package that I have ordered by basically receive a Lotta cheap products even a broken beanie hat I‚Äôve never experienced such a thing. I also ordered two other different beanie hats that were super size I think I could‚Äôve fit two of my heads in it in the main thing is I‚Äôm already having issues with two of my packages one said delivered but I never got anything. When I go to click on it it says this order cannot be refunded which makes no sense, I‚Äôm a new customer and I am not liking the way the app functions or the customer service.

title: Review
text: Now don‚Äôt get me wrong, the app is great. There are some pros and cons to it. One pro could be the fact that you could find basically anything on the app. One huge con is the games that have to be played to get free items. With every single game that you have to play, it starts off quick and easy but once you‚Äôre near the end to get your free items, it suddenly becomes impossible. Of course everybody enjoys the sound of free stuff but with how extended the games are, it doesn‚Äôt make it worth it. When you‚Äôre allowed to choose a few free items, but then you have to constantly share a link to everybody you possibly can, it‚Äôs annoying. It‚Äôs not exactly easy if you don‚Äôt have enough people to share the link with. Temu is a great app, but in the end, some bits of it should be adjusted a little bit.

title: Cheap stuff comes at the cost of being cheap
text: You really get what you paid for and with the crazy good deals this site has its very much worth it, they don‚Äôt delete comments so you can see how real people felt about the product such as it not working or it being different then advertised and whatnot, it‚Äôs not removed from the comment section so people can know, when you don‚Äôt like something or something is faulty their customer service is quick to make it right to the best of their capabilities, I‚Äôve ordered a lot from LED signs to tapestry‚Äôs to chargers and im glad to say I have never had a bad experience, just make sure you read the comments before you buy a product for best result.

title: Scams
text: Well some products are good and worth the wait. Most clothing is made of cheap non breathable polyester material. And if you try any of their games to win a free product they make it easy the first few rounds to make you think it is actually possible to win. Then the closer you are to finishing the game the less points they allow you. Like the fish game now every time i feed they give the fish .01%. The free food went down from 5g per claim to 3g. The farm game down to 1g. Making it nearly impossible to win. I have been diligently doing these for about 2 months now and there is no end in sight. One of the games just kicked me out. The other gave extention of time but at .01%/10g it would take more than the allotted time to win. Unless you make a $100+ purchase.

title: Satisfied
text: I was always skeptical about clothing that look fabulous going at a cheap price. Until a family member said her friend shops at Temu all the time and she had no problems. So I gave Temu a try I‚Äôm glad I did because they have some nice things. Now you must look at the reviews on the items you choose because you will get a better outlook on the things you purchase. Because the models clothing is clearly made of a better quality but what you get is still nice. And it needs ironing that‚Äôs the only thing I hate it comes wrinkled. And if you need to replace or return an item, very easily to return, they give you a return label free of charge to replace your item online through the app. Or creditüòÄ

title: Skeptical Into Raving Customer
text: I‚Äôve seen so many people sending me invites for this site and I was definitely skeptical (even thought it could of been a scam or my friends pages got hacked) My friends confirmed that it was a good company, and I still sat on placing an order for a few months BUT when I tell you that I was sold after my first order üëèüèΩ . The material felt so good. It didn‚Äôt feel like cheap material at all ‚Äî considering the cost. Then I was able to get a whole order FREE (just for sharing with my folks), worth $100 and had 7 outfits! There‚Äôs always a coupon with savings or a free item to select. So, this review is coming from someone who never jumps on the bandwagon and say ‚Äî it‚Äôs real and it‚Äôs worth it.

title: Affordable fashion
text: I feel like a new woman after finding TEMU. I‚Äôve bought so many fashionable and very affordable clothes in the past month. I also like what I see in the other products for sale. The ultimate compliment (besides on my clothes) is my husband has looked TEMU products and wants me to buy a couple of tools for him! Fair enough! If you are considering making TEMU purchases, do it! You won‚Äôt regret it. When ordering clothes, click on the product measurements tab to select the best size for you. The only negative is it can take nearly two weeks for shipments to come in. A small price to pay for the money saved. I love TEMU so much that I‚Äôve got three orders to come in, spaced apart by a week each. I can‚Äôt wait!

title: If you have patience for shipping, this chinese storefront is worth it.
text: I am on my 3rd round of purchases and am loving this site while the discounts are so steep.  Yes, it takes about 12 days before the shipment arrives in US from China and meets its waiting USPS shipping label, but if you can afford to wait it is well worth it for a million items that you would never normally try - but since they are so cheap you give them a try.  So far I have received about 35 small items in those 3 shipments, with everything arriving exactly as shown, in new condition, and frequently impressed about items that far exceed expectations for the price.  Some day the prices will go up, but until then it is so worth the shopping.

title: Product & Shipping
text:
So far the products that I‚Äôve received have been pretty decent.  I must admit, TEMU will reimburse you if any nitem doesn‚Äôt work.  I received a massage that didn‚Äôt work at all, and to my surprise  I was reimbursed.  As far as clothing I have had to return anything but I‚Äôm sure if the clothing is damaged they would reimburse.

Now on the other hand I have to admit, I was not impressed with the shipping company TEMU use to ship their products, ‚ÄúLASERShip‚Äù.  The courier/delivery driver, always leaves my packages outside on my stairs where anybody walking by can steal the package. Now, I  have an enclosed porch where one can easily walk up my stairs and leave my packages.  I can‚Äôt believe how lazy the delivery driver is that he/she can‚Äôt drop my packages off on my enclosed porch.

I contacted TEMU, and was told by one of their Customer Service Representatives  to contact the shipping department. I was so upset with that  representative and before I knew, I told him that I was not an employee of TEMU nor was, I employee of LASERShip and that I was not getting paid to do his job, and if you‚Äôre going to do business with a shipping company make sure you at least have the CEO contact information. 

Overall, TEMU is reasonable when it comes to their products, and I hope going forward they will work better to resolve customers issues.

title: 5 very happy kids Christmas 2022
text: I discovered Temu in November and just in time for Christmas. The Christmas sales were unbelievable. I ordered a few items and everything came in quickly and un damaged. My kids are 21,17,16,10&9 years old. It‚Äôs crazy trying to make them all happy with their Christmas presents. Though they are always grateful. This year my 17 yo son said that " Mom and Dad stepped it up this year!‚Äù Haha! The quality of all the items I ordered was amazing. So many items for such great prices. I‚Äôm definitely sticking with Temu and I have been bragging about this Store to all my friends and family. Always read the description and the reviews of their items and you can‚Äôt lose. title: TEMU

title: Temu has potential

title: Clothing

title: We love it!

title: Ms.P

title: First Temu order

title: The BEST

title: Perfect!!!
text:
I was hesitant to initially place an order with Temu but I‚Äôm extremely pleased with everything from ordering through receiving my items. title: Just like bogus carnival games
text: If you like carnival games and spam, this is the app for you. Their free gifts are an illusion just like the basketball that won‚Äôt fit into the rim at the fair and the milk jugs that are too small for the softball. They keep reducing the amount of credit you get per referral so it‚Äôs nearly impossible to get the gifts. Then comes the spam and pop ups. I was truly just going to order a few things but then all the spam and pop ups started.  I decided to give the free gifts a try. I would have been fine to not be offered anything free but after seeing the deception and trickery, I couldn‚Äôt trust the app.  I believe the deception with the free gifts and bounds offers mirrors the purpose of the app. They offer cheap stuff to deceive you when all they really want is to harvest your info and likely open you up to be hacked.  Buy cheap stuff if you want but my guess is you are giving up more than you are getting.

title: PDD Holding
text: Do not download this app. This app is a sister company of PinDuoDuo a sister company of Temu. PDD Holdings is a company who owns Pinduoduo. Pinduoduo was an app like Temu. Except it was taken down off the appstore because it would install malware onto your phone. Temu is now known to do the exact same thing. Now do your research people! A short article by Grizzly Research found out that ‚ÄúTemu was also found to contain hidden malware that was intentionally hid from the Temu‚Äôs files.‚Äù Which would allow access to almost all data for anyone who downloaded the app. For every order Temu sells they are losing $30, but the catch is they sell your information to keep up with the debt which is highly illegal, but communists dont care. And the same software engineers that built Pinduoduo, built Temu. Also you see ads for Temu stating that you can get free stuff, its most likely true but the catch is that its to get the most amount of people to download the app. Thank you.

title: Don‚Äôt ever change a thing!

title: Shoppers paradise.
text: Everything that I have ordered has been shipped and delivered quickly. 99% of the items are of good quality and value.   The product descriptions are spot on. title: This is a scam app
text: First they will tell you if you buy a minimum at five dollars then you will get a $200 credit. The way they were that is you get and first they will tell you if you buy a minimum at five dollars then you will get a $200 credit. The way they word it is you get $200 you can spend on anything you want. After you spend that five dollars you don‚Äôt see anything about the 200. Then when you contact them they ask for screenshots so they can validate their scam. Normal people don‚Äôt take screenshots when they don‚Äôt think they are being scammed. Then when you catch them in a lie or two they instantly say that it‚Äôs a promotion to where you only get a percentage off each order even though it clearly states you get $200 credit. They take your information and now I‚Äôm getting scam calls from other companies and other countries that don‚Äôt even speak my language. Do not download the Scam app

title: Great Prices & Great Communication

title: Definitely TEAM YOU‚Ä¶TEMU
text: I don‚Äôt play the games to share my contacts for free items or credits‚Ä¶.but I do enjoy all of the great sales, free shipping, awesome prices. title: Love Temu
text: I was a little hesitant to order from a store I never heard of. Kept checking out the prices and finally took the plunge and ordered some items. Very pleased with the items I received, the company is soooooo organized. You absolutely know what you ordered, the prices etc. Temu gives you an approximate delivery date, keep you informed when you will receive your items and when they are out of an items, immediately notify you and give you a refund, absolutely no waiting. I have placed several orders and some of my items make great little thank you gifts. I could go on and on, nobody made me say all those things, I am just tickled about the prices and customer service.

title: Don‚Äôt be afraid to order from Temu!
text: I‚Äôve been looking at the Temu ads for at least a month or two. I hesitated, because I thought with prices that good I would be getting junk. That is not true. All of the clothing items that I have ordered have been well-made and properly sized. I am very happy with everything that I‚Äôve ordered. I ordered quite a bit and so far I have not had to return anything. If you have not ordered from Temu, I recommend that you take a leap of faith and make your order. A coworker in my office received an order one day, and I looked at all of the products. And was so impressed. That gave me the confidence to go ahead and make my own order, and I‚Äôm pleased that I did.

title: Temu is great but doesn‚Äôt give you everything it says it will.
text:
Okay so, I got to puck out 5 ‚Äúfree‚Äù items. after I did it said I had to cut down the price to $0.00. So I thought ‚Äúwhy not.‚Äù Well as I suspected I got down to $1.00 from inviting people and spinning wheels and picking cards. once I got to that price someone excepting the invitation that I sent them cut less and less money from what I had. so I got to five cent and then it started cutting half a cent at a time. and since there was a time limit it restarted and my opportunity was over.
Very disappointed.
Lastly the shipping is SO LONG it took 12 days for a few little things to arrive.
Disappointed again.
I wanted to write this review so people didn‚Äôt het their hopes up. If Temu wants me to keep buying things from it, it needs to actually let you get free gifts.

title: Temu games is a rip off and needs to be fixed !
text: Temu constantly begs people to play the games and share share share, invite, invite, invite which I do play the games but I recently notice Temu did some updates and have made it harder to win their free gifts. On farmland the ‚Äúactive bonus‚Äù does not give all the water points like it used to. It literally just doesn‚Äôt give them. And on the fish, it does the same thing in certain circumstances with the food. Who ever designs the games really needs to make sure they are working before suckering people into playing them. They give you food and water for making purchases in the games to win the free prizes but they rip you out of the food or water in other ways so it is pointless to play. They literally gave me like 175 days to try to complete the farm and I will never get it done because it doesn‚Äôt give me the water I need to complete the mission. Shame on you Temu !!

title: Now a 2 NOT A 5 star
text: First off, its taking longer to get packages from before. Then 2nd I am getting extra stuff put in shipments that I didn‚Äôt want or order, and when I try to return the extra items I don‚Äôt get all the credit for them & the clerks say I didn‚Äôt return the said items in the return box, so I dont even get store credit for them let alone money back on card. The money refunds on Credit/Debit cards is now taking more time to be released to my bank then before. My bank has blocked Temu & Wish from payments now as a company wide policy for all customers due to the ethical issues of fraud on their end that have to do with USA & China Trade. I don‚Äôt understand why this company has gotten so rotten when I used to LOVE this company! TEMU Please hold your clerks accountable and stop this business stuff from happening so I can shop on your site again‚Ä¶please!???

title: Love Temu so far
text: So far everything has been delivered fast and with no problems and what I have bought has looked like the pics. One necklace did come with a part broken off but it wasn‚Äôt anything that couldn‚Äôt be fixed or used still. I am very happy with what I have bought and yes some things aren‚Äôt the greatest materials but when I am only paying $2 for it I am kind of expecting it. Those things I usually buy to just show off in my home somewhere or car. I am very pleased with everything I have received and delivery and I have lots of friends that but Temu and the things they have received that I have seen are also great and has made them happy also. Thanks Temu

title: The prices are awesome!
text: I love TEMU! I have purchased over $200 worth of merchandise from them in a short period of time because of the incredible sales and affordable prices of their things. They have beautiful dresses! I wore one for Mother‚Äôs Day and I bought one for an upcoming concert! I love the colors that are available, beautiful! I was admired for a purse I purchased and matched with the dress on Mother‚Äôs Day! I have people wanting to know how to order from them! You got me hooked! The only takeaway is you have to wait quite a while for your order because most of it looks like it comes from overseas but it‚Äôs good quality. My advice: locate somewhere in the United States. You‚Äôre making a killing with your items!

title: Great quality goods for a fraction of store prices!!
text: I received my first order today, after only few days of placing it on Temu, of at least 10 small sporting goods items and other diverse items. The items that I purchased were at least worth 150$ if purchased from local stores, purchased for ~$30 on Temu! I and my wife were impressed, and I am usually not easily impressed, by the quality of the goods, great material, fit great, delivered to my home and for a small fraction of the local store prices, how great is that!!!! I strongly recommend Temu! Hope they will keep going with the same quality of goods and the advantageous prices. I personally will order many more items from Temu. Happy shopping!

title: Dont expect much and you will be fine
text:
Well‚Ä¶.you do get what you pay for. I must say a few things were decent. But most of the items i bought were garbage. Very cheap and some just misleading. Ive figured that a lot of this stuff looks like items you have seen elsewhere, but then it ends up being a very cheap version of it. Spent about 150 bucks total and id estimate 130 of it i might as well lit on fire. Oh well, live and learn !
‚Äî‚Äî-Updated‚Äî‚Äî- so i felt like i should update my review. I still need to stress the fact that much of what you get may disappoint you. But I had a couple orders that I was still waiting for and now have also received some really nice quality products since my first order/review. I will still use the site but with the understanding that it is just hit or miss with some stuff.

title: Scam or real?
text:
So my coworker told me about Temu and said  it‚Äôs just like Shein which I buy from a lot and haven‚Äôt had any issues.

This was my first time buying from this company. I downloaded the app and I spun the wheel which gave me 90% off so I chose an item then went to browsing and saw an Apple Watch band I liked plus a funny shirt so in total I bought 3 items. I ordered these items on the 15th of March and it‚Äôs the 24th. They created a link for me to track my package well I‚Äôve been checking the link and nothing has updated. Three items and it‚Äôs taking this long?? Come on now, Shein has way better shipping rates and they are in another country.

It‚Äôs such a shame because I was really thrilled to check out this app but now it‚Äôs just disappointing. Definitely since influencers on TikTok and social media are raving about them. I will not be buying from this company/app ever again. Once I receive my package I will be requesting a refund.

title: Obvious Wish, Aliexpress knockoff
text: You'd be able to tell from the get go as all of the items are also the same thing you'd see on wish and aliexpress. Those free items? Jokes on you they're not free, you've got to send a bunch of your friends this annoying app and make them download it. It's like a gambling addiction. They purposely make the games to make you feel like a winner. Just like those rigged claw machines. And then finally edge you. Even through blood sweat and tears you aren't benefiting for this, this isn't just the company being nice. They get more people to download the app and it goes like a chain. Unless you're using the app to actually buy things, then don't download this app unless you like chainmail and chain threads on tumblr, or if you're into those ugly "share if you like god" minion memes. I don't care, I'll just stick to Shein and Aliexpress. More selection and nothing insanely flashy, to the point of making a toddler froth and foam.

title: I‚Äôm addicted
text: I‚Äôve ordered from Temu so many times I‚Äôve lost count. Each order brings more fabulous items. The prices are amazing. The last ordered I received I just laughed and was so happy looking through all my things. I was hesitant because of the whole mess with the wish app so I was careful only to use my PayPal but this company is truly trustworthy. I wanted to return shoes that were too small. They refunded me my money and told me to donate the shoes. How awesome is that? Now I have the correct sizes for my daughter and a child less fortunate then us has 3 new pairs of shoes. I love this app. My husband maybe not so much cause I‚Äôm addicted lol just joking. It‚Äôs so cheap he doesn‚Äôt even notice the small dent in our account.
